description:
I saw a video on the official Solana youtube account talking about how they were airdroping 15 Sol to people. Since i saw it was on the official youtube account, i thought it was real. I downloaded phantom wallet, loaded it up with 2.1 Sol (about $350 USD) because it said i needed at least 2 Sol in the account for the airdrop, and scanned the QR code on the website "airdropsolan.com". Next thing i know, I don't have $350 in my account. I have 16 cents.

I saw a video on the official Solana youtube account talking about how they were airdroping 15 Sol to people. Since i saw it was on the official youtube account, i thought it was real. I downloaded phantom wallet, loaded it up with 2.1 Sol (about $350 USD) because it said i needed at least 2 Sol in the account for the airdrop, and scanned the QR code on the website "airdropsolan.com". Next thing i know, I don't have $350 in my account. I have 16 cents.

Amount lost

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.

Airdropsolan.com

Airdropsolan.com
